data.title: Listen: The Black Crowes share recently unearthed track 'Charming Mess'
data.meta_description: The Black Crowes have shared a recently unearthed track from 1990 called ‘Charming Mess’. It appears on the 'Shake Your Money Maker' reissue
data.text:
Lifted from the 'Shake Your Money Maker' reissue

The Black Crowes have shared a recently unearthed and previously unheard track from more than 30 years ago called ‘Charming Mess’.

Originally recorded by Chris and Rich Robinson and co. as their first single, ‘Charming Mess’ was ultimately ditched altogether and didn’t make it onto their defining debut album ‘Shake Your Money Maker’ back in 1990.

‘Charming Mess’ is just one of the rarities that appears on the multi-format reissue of ‘Shake Your Money Maker’ which lands on Friday 26th February 2021 via UMe/American Recordings.

A typically infectious rock n’ roll stomper, cast your ears on The Black Crowes’ ‘Charming Mess’ right here:

The reissue of ‘Shake Your Money Maker’ was overseen by Chris and Rich Robinson alongside original producer George Drakoulias.

The 4LP and 3CD Super Deluxe versions include the original album, remastered; three never-before-heard studio recordings; two unreleased demos from the band's early incarnation as Mr. Crowe's Garden; B-sides; a spectacular, high-energy 14-song unreleased concert recorded in their hometown of Atlanta, GA in December 1990; reproductions of an early Mr. Crowe's Garden show flyer, setlist and tour laminate; a 4" Crowes patch; and a 20-page book with liner notes by David Fricke.

A 2CD Deluxe version has the remastered album along with the unreleased studio songs, demos, and b-sides. There are also standard 1CD and1LP versions that are the mastered version of the original.

Originally released 31 years ago in February 1990, ‘Shake Your Money Maker’ spawned the singles ‘Jealous Again,’ ‘Twice As Hard,’ and ‘She Talks To Angels’ plus The Black Crowes’ cover of the Otis Redding track ‘Hard To Handle.’

The Black Crowes play the following UK shows this coming autumn on the Shake Your Money Maker 30th anniversary tour:

OCTOBER 2021

London O2 Brixton Academy – Sat 23rd

London O2 Brixton Academy – Sun 24th

Manchester O2 Apollo – Tue 26th

Shake Your Money Maker 30th Anniversary – 4LP Box Tracklisting:

LP 1: Shake Your Money Maker (2020 Remaster)

Side One:

1) Twice As Hard

2) Jealous Again

3) Sister Luck

4) Could I've Been So Blind

5) Seeing Things

Side Two:

1) Hard To Handle

2) Thick N' Thin

3) She Talks To Angels

4) Struttin' Blues

5) Stare It Cold

6) Mercy, Sweet Moan

LP 2: More Money Maker: Unreleased Songs and B-Sides

Side One:

1) Charming Mess

2) 30 Days In The Hole

3) Don't Wake Me

4) Jealous Guy

5) Waitin' Guilty

Side Two:

1) Hard To Handle (With Horns Remix)

2) Jealous Again (Acoustic Version)

3) She Talks To Angels (Acoustic Version)

4) She Talks To Angels (Mr. Crowe's Garden Demo)

5) Front Porch

6) Sermon (Mr. Crowe's Garden Demo)

LP3 and 4 The Homecoming Concert: Atlanta, GA December 1990

Side One:

1) Introduction

2) Thick N' Thin

3) You're Wrong

4) Twice As Hard

5) Could I've Been So Blind

6) Seeing Things For The First Time

Side Two:

2) Sister Luck

3) Hard To Handle

4) Shake 'Em On Down/Get Back

Side Three:

1) Struttin' Blues

2) Words You Throw Away

Side Four:

1) Stare It Cold

2) Jealous Again
